languages.text:
You have gained access to {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}! These {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can sometimes turn the tide of events even in the most hopeless battle. But remember: {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} not only help in combat, but also have negative consequences. Study the abilities carefully before using them.
Both are unique to each class and develop as characters {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Вы получили доступ к {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героическому акту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянным мерам{/g}! Порой эти способности могут изменить ход даже самого безнадежного сражения. Но помните: {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g} не только помогают в бою, но и обладают негативными последствиями. Внимательно изучите их перед применением.
Способности обоих типов уникальны для каждого класса и развиваются с повышением уровня персонажей.

traits.locale_text:
You have gained access to {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic Act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate Measures{/g}! These abilities can sometimes turn the tide of events in the most hopeless battle. But remember: {g| Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate Measures{/g} not only help in combat, but also have negative consequences. Study them carefully before using them.
Both abilities are unique to each class and develop as characters level up.

Both are unique to each class and develop as characters {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g}.

You have gained access to {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}! These {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can sometimes turn the tide of events even in the most hopeless battle. But remember: {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} not only help in combat, but also have negative consequences. Study the abilities carefully before using them.
Both are unique to each class and develop as characters {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g}.

languages.text: Вы получили доступ к {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героическому акту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянным мерам{/g} — это уникальные для каждого архетипа, особо мощные способности, которые могут изменить ход даже самого безнадежного сражения. В бою использование обеих способностей становится доступно при определенном уровне моментума — высоком для героического акта и низком для отчаянных мер. Помните: отчаянные меры не только помогают в бою, но и обладают негативными последствиями. Внимательно изучите их перед применением. Обе способности получают дополнительные возможности по мере развития архетипа персонажа.

Both abilities are unique to each class and develop as characters level up.

Вы получили доступ к {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героическому акту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянным мерам{/g}! languages.text:
¡Has obtenido acceso a los {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actos heroicos{/g} y a las {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medidas desesperadas{/g}! Esas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} pueden cambiar el curso de los acontecimientos en las batallas más desesperadas. Pero recuerda: aunque las {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medidas desesperadas{/g} te ayudan en combate, también tienen consecuencias negativas. Estudia bien esas capacidades antes de usarlas.
Son únicas para cada clase y se desarrollan según los personajes {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}suben de nivel{/g}.
languages.original_text:
You have gained access to {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}! These {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can sometimes turn the tide of events even in the most hopeless battle. But remember: {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} not only help in combat, but also have negative consequences. Study the abilities carefully before using them.
Both are unique to each class and develop as characters {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
¡Has obtenido acceso a los {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actos heroicos{/g} y a las {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medidas desesperadas{/g}! Esas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} pueden {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}cambiar{/g} el curso de los acontecimientos en las batallas más desesperadas. Pero recuerda: aunque las {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medidas desesperadas{/g} te ayudan en combate, también tienen consecuencias negativas. Estudia bien esas capacidades antes de usarlas.
Son únicas para cada clase y se desarrollan según los personajes {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}suben de nivel{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}を使えるようになった！この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は絶望的な戦いであっても、流れを一変させることがある。だが{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}は戦闘に役立つものの、悪い結果ももたらすことを忘れてはならない。使用する前にアビリティをじっくり研究しよう。
どちらも各クラス独自のもので、キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}レベルアップ{/g}するにつれて強化される。
languages.original_text:
You have gained access to {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}! These {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can sometimes turn the tide of events even in the most hopeless battle. But remember: {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} not only help in combat, but also have negative consequences. Study the abilities carefully before using them.
Both are unique to each class and develop as characters {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}苦肉の策{/g}を使えるようになった！これらの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は、絶望的な戦いであっても、流れを{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}一変{/g}させることがある。だが{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}苦肉の策{/g}は戦闘に役立つものの、悪い結果ももたらすことを忘れてはならない。使用する前にアビリティをじっくり研究しよう。
どちらも各クラス独自のもので、キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}レベルアップ{/g}するにつれて向上する。

languages.text:
您已经可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}了！即便是在最绝望的战况之中，这些{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或许也可以扭转战局。但要记住，尽管{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}拥有强大的效果，但也同样会产生负面效果。在使用这些能力之前，请仔细阅读能力效果。
每种职业都有这两种能力，能力效果会随着角色{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}升级{/g}而不断变强。
languages.original_text:
You have gained access to {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}! These {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can sometimes turn the tide of events even in the most hopeless battle. But remember: {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} not only help in combat, but also have negative consequences. Study the abilities carefully before using them.
Both are unique to each class and develop as characters {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
您已经可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}了！即便是在最绝望的战况之中，这些{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或许也可以扭转战局。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}但要记住，尽管{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}拥有强大的效果，但也同样会产生负面效果。在使用这些能力之前，请仔细阅读能力效果。
每种职业都有这两种能力，能力效果会随着角色{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}升级{/g}而不断变强。

languages.text:
Du hast Zugang zu {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentaten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstaten{/g} erhalten! Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} können manchmal sogar im hoffnungslosesten Kampf das Schlachtenglück wenden. Aber bedenke: {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstaten{/g} helfen nicht nur im Kampf, sondern haben auch negative Folgen. Studiere die Fähigkeiten sorgfältig, bevor du sie einsetzt.
Beide sind einzigartig für jede Klasse und entwickeln sich mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Hochstufen{/g} des Charakters weiter.

languages.text:
Vous avez accès à des {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actes héroïques{/g} et à des {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesures désespérées{/g} ! Ces {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} peuvent parfois renverser le cours des événements, même lorsque le combat semble perdu. Mais attention : les {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesures désespérées{/g} ne sont pas seulement utiles au combat, elles s'accompagnent aussi de conséquences négatives. Examinez attentivement les capacités avant de les utiliser.
Toutes deux sont propres à chaque classe et évoluent au fil de la {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}progression{/g} des personnages.
languages.original_text:
You have gained access to {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}! These {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} can sometimes turn the tide of events even in the most hopeless battle. But remember: {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} not only help in combat, but also have negative consequences. Study the abilities carefully before using them.
Both are unique to each class and develop as characters {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Vous avez accès à des {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actes héroïques{/g} et à des {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesures désespérées{/g} ! Ces {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} peuvent parfois {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}inverser{/g} le cours des événements, même lorsque le combat semble perdu. Mais n'oubliez pas : les {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesures désespérées{/g} ne sont pas seulement utiles au combat, elles s’accompagnent aussi de conséquences négatives. Examinez attentivement les capacités avant de les utiliser.
Toutes deux sont propres à chaque classe et évoluent au fil de la {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}progression{/g} des personnages.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Kahramanca eylem{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlemlere{/g} erişim kazandın! Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetler{/g} kimi zaman en umutsuz çatışmalarda bile olayların gidişatını tersine çevirebilir. Ancak unutma ki {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlemler{/g} çatışmalarda yardımcı olsalar da olumsuz sonuçlar da doğururlar. Kabiliyetleri kullanmadan önce dikkatlice incele.
Her sınıfın iki türde de eşsiz kabiliyetleri bulunur ve karakterler {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}seviye atladıkça{/g} bu kabiliyetler de gelişirler.
